component.name: OpenTodoList
component.summary: Todo list and note taking application

description.p: OpenTodoList is an todo list and note taking application. Create todo lists, notes and put other resources, arranging them in libraries. These libraries can be kept locally or synchronized with services such as NextCloud or ownCloud to sync them across your devices.

screenshot.caption: Libraries can contain todo lists, notes and images

release.p: This relase fixes the issues #208, #202, #90, #210, #207, #193 and #191. The most notable change among these is the introduction of an item cache, which speeds up several aspects of the app (start-up, listing of large item collections and so on).
